title: Noche de Estrellas
overview: Noche de Estrellas promises an unforgettable evening filled with exclusive interviews, behind-the-scenes glimpses, stunning fashion moments, and more. As The Biggest Night in Latin Music™ celebrates its 25th anniversary, this year's pre-show will immerse audiences in the vibrant atmosphere of Latin music. Viewers will witness the first winners of the night and enjoy a special package highlighting the nominees for the Best New Artist category through the Best New Artist Showcase. Additionally, this year's show will reminisce with artists about their first performances and the most emblematic moments from the last 25 years of the Latin GRAMMYs. This retrospective will provide a unique perspective on the evolution and impact of this prestigious event within the Latin music industry, making it a night to remember for fans and artists alike.
